    • Uses of HostException in ch.supertomcat.bh.exceptions

      Subclasses of HostException in ch.supertomcat.bh.exceptions 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HostAbortedException
      This exception is to let the pic now, that the download was aborted while parsing the url.
      class  HostCompletedException
      This exception is to let the pic now, that it not should download anything and just delete itself from the queue.
      class  HostFileNotExistException
      This is exception is for every download where the file is not exist anymore on the server.
      class  HostFileTemporaryOfflineException
      This is exception is for every download where the file is not exist anymore on the server.
      class  HostImageUrlNotFoundException
      This exception is for hostclasses if they didn't find the url of a file
      class  HostIOException
      This exception is thrown when a hostclass gets an error while downloading a container-page
